fields.description:
When I do a distribution build, it ends up doing an ad-hoc build instead. This is not an issue related to certificates or whatnot. When you do the build, the second line of the console says the build type is dist-adhoc:

{code}
[INFO] :      Build type: production
[INFO] :      Building for target: dist-adhoc
[INFO] :      Building using iOS SDK: 6.1
[INFO] :      Building for device family: iphone
{code}

Tried using Studio 3.0 to build, produces the same result.
fields.summary: Studio 3.1 Distribute for iTunes Store is producing ad-hoc builds

comments.body:
Hi Shannon,

We addressed this issue (originally reported in TISTUD-4311) in the RC stream. Could you try updating to it using the update URL http://preview.appcelerator.com/appcelerator/studio/standalone/update/rc/ to see if it helps resolve the problem?

Thanks.
